changeSet.author: zlatkov
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `employee` ( `id` int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `address` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `city` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `countryid` int DEFAULT NULL, `date_of_birth` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `email` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `firstname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `gender` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `initials` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `lastname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `marital_status` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `mobile` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `othername` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `phone` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `photo` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `stateid` int DEFAULT NULL, `title` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `employeetypeid` int DEFAULT NULL, `hire_date` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `jobtitleid` int DEFAULT NULL, `username` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `about_me` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `FK9hga8iyrt1lh8ofyic3lb0792` (`countryid`), KEY `FKdququtwg0blqbvnpwhhd8g3jf` (`stateid`), KEY `FKe1h4f2i4kb3hdr67guoeyg16h` (`employeetypeid`), KEY `FKod9tsamp0p54ko9vk9fwusrig` (`jobtitleid`), CONSTRAINT `FK9hga8iyrt1lh8ofyic3lb0792` FOREIGN KEY (`countryid`) REFERENCES `country` (`id`), CONSTRAINT `FKdququtwg0blqbvnpwhhd8g3jf` FOREIGN KEY (`stateid`) REFERENCES `state` (`id`), CONSTRAINT `FKe1h4f2i4kb3hdr67guoeyg16h` FOREIGN KEY (`employeetypeid`) REFERENCES `employee_type` (`id`), CONSTRAINT `FKod9tsamp0p54ko9vk9fwusrig` FOREIGN KEY (`jobtitleid`) REFERENCES `job_title` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=9 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci;
